snippet.title: USA Pro Basketball for Pc Engine Gameplay
snippet.description:
I enjoyed this game. I am the team in grey playing on the right side.

To dunk, you are supposed to press something on the direction pad and a button. I didn't know that, I tried different buttons and then the console restarted ( like the 10th time I did that ). But I would have won the game...

I tried for a couple of times to learn how to make the 3-pointers. It didn't go to well at first. Then I made a couple.

The numbers next to player names represent a stat. It is one number for every stat, and the stats are like speed, shot, defense, and so on.
 
Played on original console. 
More about us at http://japanspel.blogspot.com/
